com.hotels.styx.api.configuration

Interface Configuration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Configuration.MapBackedConfiguration

    public interface Configuration
    Static configuration.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Configuration.Context
      This should be removed if possible, as its creation was premature - intended for a use-case that we have not implemented.
      static class  Configuration.MapBackedConfiguration
      Allows a configuration object to be programmatically created.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Configuration EMPTY_CONFIGURATION 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <X> X as(Class<X> type) 
      default Optional<String> get(String key)
      Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped, converted to String or Optional.absent if this configuration source contains no mapping for the key.
      <X> Optional<X> get(String key, Class<X> type)
      Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped, converted to the target type specified or Optional.absent if this configuration source contains no mapping for the key.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY_CONFIGURATION

        static final Configuration EMPTY_CONFIGURATION

    • Method Detail

      • get

        default Optional<String> get(String key)
        Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped, converted to String or Optional.absent if this configuration source contains no mapping for the key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key whose associated value is to be returned
        Returns:
        the value to which the specified key is mapped, or Optional.absent if this map contains no mapping for the key

      • get

        <X> Optional<X> get(String key,
                    Class<X> type)
        Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped, converted to the target type specified or Optional.absent if this configuration source contains no mapping for the key.
        Type Parameters:
        X - type of the configuration value
        Parameters:
        key - the key whose associated value is to be returned
        type - the target type
        Returns:
        the value to which the specified key is mapped, or Optional.absent if this map contains no mapping for the key

      • as

        default <X> X as(Class<X> type)
          throws ConversionException
        Throws:
        ConversionException
